sustainabilityPage.title: Sustainability - Recycled Polymers for a Circular Economy
sustainabilityPage.description: Discover PolySource Global's recycled-first approach. 6,200+ tonnes of traceable recycled polymers supplied with ISO 14001 certified partners.
sustainabilityPage.heroSubtitle: Building a circular supply chain for polymers without compromising quality.

commitment.title: Prioritize Recycled Content
commitment.description: We push recycled materials first, offering up to 50% PCR where technically suitable while being transparent when virgin is the better choice.

commitment.title: Full Material Traceability
commitment.description: Every shipment includes material passports with origin, processing methods, and certification status—no vague claims.

commitment.title: Consistent Quality Standards
commitment.description: Batch-to-batch consistency through rigorous testing protocols so recycled grades meet the same specifications as virgin equivalents.

commitment.title: Support Regional Recycling
commitment.description: Partnerships with MENA recyclers to reduce transport emissions and build local circular infrastructure.

quality.title: Quality Over Claims
quality.description: We only call something sustainable when it performs in production.

traceable.title: Traceable Sourcing
traceable.description: Every batch is documented so you know the exact origin and process.

certified.title: Certified Partners
certified.description: We work exclusively with ISO 14001 certified recyclers and processors.

regional.title: Regional Impact
regional.description: Supporting MENA recycling infrastructure and diverting post-consumer waste from landfills.

sustainabilityPage.certificationsDescription: Certifications maintained across our supply chain and available for compliant materials.
sustainabilityPage.impactSubtitle: Transparent reporting on our recycled material supply

impactCards.label: Average PCR Content in Recycled Grades

impactList: 6,200+ tonnes of recycled polymers supplied with traceability

sustainabilityPage.transparencyIntro: We don't claim to be carbon-neutral or perfectly circular—no B2B polymer supplier can honestly make that claim today. What we do claim:
transparencyList: We prioritize recycled materials whenever technical requirements allow
We provide complete traceability and never make vague sustainability claims
We're honest about when virgin material is the better choice
We continuously work to improve our processes and expand recycled offerings
